content: {A笑眯眯}My Planette has become so lush! The magical little friends who help take care of the Planette... Baa? Where did they go?

content: Have this <style=Highlight>{奖励名称}</style>. Place it in the room, and the whole space will turn as floofalicious, soft, and cooozy as the sky, baa-lissful~.

content: Ah, I'm not trying to turn you all into plushies...! I'm just looking for some inspiration, is all.

content: {A笑眯眯}With them helping me, I can focus more on creating the floofy skies in my dreams...
